website_summaries.verdict: This Remington electric razor smoothly glides over legs for the quickest, closest, and most comfortable shave possible whether you use it in our out of the shower.
cons: Although this electric razor includes a charging stand, it takes a whopping 20 hours to recharge its battery

website_summaries.verdict: This wet and dry women's shaver will give you a close shave and keeps a charge for repeated use.
pros: It has a great feel in your hand, allowing for greater control and saves your skin from razor burn
cons: There is no swivel head, making it difficult on curves, and the replacement foils are difficult to find

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if works...rec'd used shaver!!!
customer_reviews.text: It came used. Didn't open until return window was closed. Noticed little brown hairs all over handle...and possibly deodorant on blade surface? Who sells someone a used shaver? No thank you. Not looking to buy HIV today. What is going on Amazon? Have you gotten too big for your britches? Huge quality control mistake. Thank goodness I checked it before my pre teen used. She had no clue to inspect before use!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron C.

customer_reviews.title: Good razor, but can't buy the replacement foils
customer_reviews.text: I would give this more stars because it's a great razor, however considering the fact that it is less than a year old and I cannot buy the replacement foils for it......was a waste of money I have to buy a new razor because the foils are not available and the one's sold on Amazon are not for this razor.
customer_reviews.author: mdcolliver

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as close a shave as the much cheaper Panasonic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a Panasonic ES2207P that died in less than a year. Remington is a long time, and respected brand in men's and women's shavers, so I decided to spent considerably more and buy this unit. I've used it one time. Pro: No pulling whatsoever. VERY comfortable to use. Con: Considerable stubble remaining, which was never the case with the Panasonic. I also prefer the Panasonic's charger adapter which plugs into the wall and provides a stand for the shaver, instead of needing more counter space that I don't have.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F

customer_reviews.title: Its not nearly as good as my old Remington which lasted 15 yrs
customer_reviews.text: Its not nearly as good as my old Remington which lasted 15 yrs. I was forced to get a new shaver due to the old heads no longer being available. Total bummer. After just a few months of this one, it doesn't hold a charge well and can only be used for about 45 seconds without slowing down even after being on the charger all night.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crowell

customer_reviews.title: Best Shaver Yet
customer_reviews.text: This is incredible for every-days smoothe in delicate places. So much safer in every way than the open blades of a razor. Love that I can use it in the shower, but it's great for touch-ups dry (a little powder helps). I don't use it on my legs in the shower because it has to be used slowly, but it's great for dry, out-of-shower touch-ups on the legs. Easy to clean, easy to operate. We'll see how it does in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: JulieAnn Carter-Winward

customer_reviews.title: DISGUSTING!!! It came used and full of another woman's hair!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond horrified with this because I just opened the box and immediately upon picking up the razor saw that it was covered in another woman's hairs!!!!! And these hairs fell all over my bed!! This is the MOST DISGUSTING thing that has ever happened to me in a decade of online shopping. PLEASE do not buy this, please. Obviously I am returning it and this is seriously disturbing and offensive to me.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: All in all, good product. Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Took some getting used to, but all in all it's a great product. Long battery life and as exoected image. Tip: when shaving I suggest using cream and holding the shaver up right instead of slanted (if that makes any sense?) to where the top is flat on the skin. This will help prevent pulling, get a closer shave, and avoidig scratching the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Yowell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: After buying and replacing several shavers that were less expensive (in the $15-$20 range), I finally decided to spend a little bit more and I am so happy I did. I don't have to go over and over the same areas like I always had to with the cheaper shavers. This shaves my legs nice and smooth in minutes and is easy to handle - not too light or too heavy, not too big or small. Just right and a great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive Skin Approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a teenager. She loves that it does not "pull". She has very sensitive skin with eczema and has not had any of the problems with this razor as she has had with past appliances. Granted that no electric razor will shave legs like an actual blade razor but, despite that, it gives a really great close trim. I have actually borrowed it from her and been very impressed with the outcome. We are very please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Not a close shave at all. Misses hairs even after multiple passes. Comes with carry/storage but barely fits all in. The screen/blade keeps popping off the head of it and have to snap back on.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Shop another brand! ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed! Normally, if you spend a little more - you get a better product! In this case, it was the opposite! My daughter and I were excited to use this shaver, but there were problems within the 1st week! I made sure it was fully charged before using, as well. Problem 1: something mentioned elsewhere in the comments - it stays on! The only way I got it to stop, was by putting it back on the base. Problem 2: it has been on the charger for days, but no matter how many times I press, it won't turn on! Will be sending this back for a refund - & I DON'T want a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: WesJ

customer_reviews.title: Died after only 5 uses 😵
customer_reviews.text: Well, can I give it no stars? Purchased in the spring, thinking ahead, that was my first mistake, I guess. I'm not very hairy, and wear long pants most of the time, so I don't shave that often, used this maybe 5 times. Now that's it's warm, I wanted to shave my legs, and gablowey! the button jammed, and would not turn off. It only ran for another minute or so, and then stopped. I tried charging it again and nope, no response, dead as can be. Checked back to my account and I'm long past the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Anon from somewhere unknown

customer_reviews.title: USED!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a USED shaver!!! I didn’t even have to open the packaging to see that the shaver was full of somebody else’s hair! So gross. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia R

customer_reviews.title: awesome shave
customer_reviews.text: There really is nothing that I dislike about the shaver, its angled head is awesome. Smooth glide. Works great with shaving soap that I get from my local health food store. Seems light weight enough. Love the Almond oil strip. I know that some people complain of the noise, but electric shavers are noisy. This one does not seem too overly noisy compared to my old Ladies Norelco dry shaver that I have had since 1977. One has too take into consideration that this is only used for about 5 minutes maybe three times a week depending on how fast the hair grows, so the noise can be tolerated. I won't be sending this one back!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it has worked fine for about 3 YES 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shaver in April 2018,,however I did not start using it until mid June 2018...it has worked fine for about 3 YES 3 weeks!!!! when I went to use it this last time...it just won't come on...the light shows lit when it is on the charger but will not work when I turn it on...if you need a dependable razor...then you do not need this one...I will eat this money as when I went to return it...I saw that they had a 30 day return policy...well honestly, it didn't even work for 30 days...but I bought it in April so they don't consider that...shameful for an Amazon Prime order...will never buy from this seller again!!! grade??? FFFFFFFFF
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell you how happy I am with the results
customer_reviews.text: It took me a year trying to shave my legs properly after having a stroke to think about an electric shaver. I had no clue what to even look for. I recognized the Remington name and ordered this one. I can't tell you how happy I am with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Tried Others.. But...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot use safety razors due to blood thinners and I searched and looked for the quality razors of years gone by and they are all very cheaply made and scratch your skin! I've purchased and returned 3 before I remembered the Remington line of shavers I once had. This unit works VERY WELL and is smooth along the skin. It charges fast and gives hours of use before needing a recharge. It works just as the shavers did from days gone by... thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Teriann Shrum

customer_reviews.title: Great product for me
customer_reviews.text: This solved a problem of mine. Shaving with a regular razor made my skin itch. This does not. I shave immediately after I get out of the shower and have had no problems with this.
customer_reviews.author: Aninal lover and Reader

customer_reviews.title: Hated it at first-love it now
customer_reviews.text: So as my first time regularly using an electric razor on my legs I will say I was disappointed and thought it did not work and hated it. But the instructions clearly say it takes some getting used to and that you need to adjust, so I reluctantly followed the instructions. It has been a few months now and I love it! So glad that I tried. It took some getting used to but it is so nice to just sit on the edge of the bed and do a quick shave. Being in the Southern States shorts are a must.
customer_reviews.author: Dale H

customer_reviews.title: Is this for real?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on Amazon first time for my wife in August. After a couple of weeks the release button was not working so any time you would use it it would stop only when the battery was off. Sent it back. I received a replacement. Due to a mix up with addresses it came to us 2 weeks later. After probably 10 days it stopped working because it was not charging when put to the charger. Tried a few days but still it is not working It is now out of Amazon one month return period. I'll see if Remington is going to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantinos Balafas

customer_reviews.title: It is great for traveling abroad as it is 100-240v 50/60Hz
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shaver after returning another brand. It provides a close shave and seems well made. The shaver can be used multiple times before needing to be recharged. It is great for traveling abroad as it is 100-240v 50/60Hz. All you need is an adapter to use traveling in a country using 240 volts.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk. I expected something from Remington, that it would be of good quality. I used it on my leg hair and I had to go over it several times and even then it didn't get all of the hair, especially missing the finer hairs. I ended up returning it. I wouldn't recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Ann Buckley

customer_reviews.title: certainly not the best but expected for the price when comparing to more ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my braun that finally gave out. It’s a decent shave, certainly not the best but expected for the price when comparing to more higher end shavers. It does get the job done and still better than dealing with a regular manual razor. I probably will need to upgrade eventually though, because I like the way my old braun was, but this is ok for now.
customer_reviews.author: Twin Mama

customer_reviews.title: Annoying problem in an otherwise good shaver
customer_reviews.text: This shaver worked very well for one year. It performed better than the Panasonic shavers I had used in the past. However, one of the heads kept coming off and I had to put it back on. Now both of the heads come off by themselves every time I open the shaver up to clean the heads--usually after each use. It's quite an annoyance, since the heads can end up scattered on the floor or even in the bathroom trash can. I'm buying a new shaver, the same kind I bought a year ago, but I'm not happy that I have to get another one this soon.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Imnediately. Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product less than 1 star, I would. It says you can use it wet or dry and with shaving cream of any type. When I used it with shaving cream and wet, immediately the head would not reattach so it was useless. Lousy product. Do not purchase. It broke within 3 uses.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: This works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked electric shavers. This one performs beautifully! You can use it on your face, underarms, legs, etc. It's never going to get as close as a razor but none of them do: because they aren't razors. This one does a fabulous job. I was pleased with how quickly it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use to Scratches my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor specifically to dry shave. It not only scratched my skin, but it didn't shave closely. So I decided to try it in the shower with shaving gel, that was better, but it was still scratchy. I had to run the razor over each area several times to get the close shave I was hoping for. I wish I had a better review, I'll keep it and try again, but so far I'm not as impressed as I'd hoped to be
customer_reviews.author: Mid Columbia Insulation LLC

customer_reviews.title: BUY A MENS SHAVER. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in September of 2017 and I’m 99% sure it was defective when I got it because it just wasn’t doing a very good job at all and it seemed like one of the components to the shaver head was broken. But I kept it. I’ve used it MAYBE 2 times on leg hair and now it’s April 2018 and it’s broken. Won’t shave a dang thing. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shaver with the intent of teaching my pre-teen daughter how to shave her legs. I think the battery in it is unable to keep a charge. The first time we tried it, it ran for 1 minute and then died. I thought it needed to be charged longer. I tried it again a few days later while having it on the charger those couple of days and it lasted 30 seconds before it died again. I'm really disappointed and would not recommend this. By comparison, I bought my husband a men's Remington razor for Christmas that he has literally only charged 1x since he received it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue P

customer_reviews.title: Gives you a pretty good shave
customer_reviews.text: I have reached the age where I no longer wanted to have to put on the shave cream and inevitably cut my bad ankle, trying to get a good shave. I live in the south, where we know heat and where shorts and dresses are what you live in for the majority of the year. The razor is a good weight, easy for my arthritic hands to hold and gives me a good enough shave. The price is right and it more than meets my needs
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.

customer_reviews.title: I so wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. I have tried it both dry and wet and either way, it just doesn’t want to cut well and doesn’t do well with close at all. If I go over the same area 3-5 times I’m somewhat happy with the result. Sigh, isn’t there an electric shaver out there that cuts well? Closely? It does seem to hold a charge well. I also find it difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Ehh not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd remington. I lost my first and they didnt make my old model anymore, apparently. I use this solely to shave the bikini area. It is not very efficient at this area. It doesnt get a very close shave. I miss my old one! Not impressed with this one at all. It's probably fine for other areas but I do not recommend for bikini region!
customer_reviews.author: Erin W.

customer_reviews.title: Not smooth, scrapes
customer_reviews.text: It feels like its cutting my leg as I go, like scraping it. It doesnt feel smooth,it works but have to go over more than once
customer_reviews.author: Das.

customer_reviews.title: Will wake you up in the middle of the night
customer_reviews.text: Update: Now has stopped working entirely. Lasted less than a month. All was good for a few weeks, until it started to spontaneously turn on by itself. And it is very loud. Seems the on-off button is stuck because I can’t get it to go off without a dozen or so attempts. And then a couple hours later, the process starts again.
customer_reviews.author: A Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this to ease the whole shaving process. I was very disappointed. Total waste of money. After shaving with this, I still had stubble. No close shaving, no smooth legs. Used twice and now collects dust.
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this because she has psoriasis really bad and we figured this would help her keep her legs shaved without breaking her out. She tried it out yesterday for the first time and it worked great. Cuts just as close as a regular razor does.
customer_reviews.author: joey s phifer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a tiny bit of stubble but overall a good quality razor.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Miller

customer_reviews.title: can't ask for better than that
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these i purchased. My first lasted about 15 years; can't ask for better than that. I like that there are replacement heads that you buy when the shaver begins to get a little dull. I don't like it as a wet razor though; it doesn't work as well as when I use it dry.
customer_reviews.author: CEK

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use.. but it didn’t do anything for a smooth feel.. couldn’t even tell I used it , I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Darla Burlingame

customer_reviews.title: Favorite razor!
customer_reviews.text: I love this razor! I had only ever used manual / normal razors before and then I read a blog post about electric razors being easier on the skin. This turned out to be completely true, at least with this razor, and I’m so happy not to get cuts and rashes anymore from shaving! I’ve had it for over a month and use it daily with no problems so far. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: One drop?... and broken!
customer_reviews.text: I have a mixed review about this product. I really liked everything about it except that it’s designed to be used for both wet and dry use and it only took one time for it to slip out of my hand and it doesn’t work anymore; it should be able to withstand a drop especially it’s wet and slippery. The worst part about it is that I only had the chance to use it less than ten times when it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Mylonas

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst razor I ever bought. Doesn't keep a charge long enough to shave your legs. I still have the old Remington razor and it still works perfectly. It didn't start going bad on me until it was too late to return it. If you buy it, buy it with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt really work
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this shaver 5 - 6 times now and it doesnt really work. Doesnt shave at all let alone closely.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Baldonado

customer_reviews.title: Pulled hair
customer_reviews.text: Pulled out hair when I was shaving . It works ok other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner2

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a bad razor burn!
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with this razor. I bought a new one because my old one was giving me razor burn, and this razor is doing the same even if I use shaving cream along with it. Most of the time I use a regular razor and shave cream with it , in stead of using the electric razor at all. I would not recommend this razor at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth B.

customer_reviews.title: Can't really ask for more then this!
customer_reviews.text: The stand is sturdy, multiples uses and still no sign of slowing down, cleanup is slightly annoying but once you get used to it there is little to no issues. The shave is clean and leaves no marks visibly or stubbles. A must have in the bathroom and easy to utilise.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: It pulls hair out...doesn't shave!
customer_reviews.text: Got for my daughter as it said it didn't pull. Wrong! Its terrible. Not what I expected. Wanted to return it but couldn't. Only had it 2 weeks. Window closed for returns. Seems like they know there are issues and don't want to deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: tigger

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of these so if my battery runs out before I remember to charge one, I still have a back up. I love them. I use it every night before bed and the buzzing is actually comforting to me... not to my husband though, lol. I've had one for a little over 2 years and the other for just under a year. Quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: I prefer a razor
customer_reviews.text: In a pinch, this works, but a razor is still superior. I felt like I actually spent more time shaving with this thing than I did with a razor.
customer_reviews.author: Jynna McMillin

customer_reviews.title: Item Unreliable After Only 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this item - it worked great for about 2 months. After it was no longer eligible for return, it completely quit working. It would show as "green" on the charger, meaning it was completely charged. But then nothing me or my husband did could get it to turn on again. Disappointing after only 2 months of ownership; I hate that I spent the money on it at all & I am not one to write negative reviews, this may only be my 2nd one in at least 4 years of having Prime, perhaps longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom who cannot shave with a regular razor anymore. She said it’s great. I may be buying one also!

customer_reviews.title: NUT ALLERGY PEOPLE BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE read the FINE PRINT - this has ALMOND OIL that penetrates the skin. It could remain on the skin after use. I highly recommend NOT using this if you have a friend, relative or someone in your house with a nut allergy (like my 5yr old son does). stay safe.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Benn

customer_reviews.title: Very dependable electric razor
customer_reviews.text: This electric razor does a fine job of shaving hair. In 30 years, this is only the 2nd I’ve had to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Diephuis

customer_reviews.title: Not struggling and getting stressful when shaving my legs.
customer_reviews.text: I have a thicker hair growth than most women; and it's the first shaver that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy E. Larisa

customer_reviews.title: I do not like much of anything about the Remington Smooth & Silky
customer_reviews.text: I do not like much of anything about the Remington Smooth & Silky. I have not experienced anything about it that the adjectives smooth &/ or silky could be usedp. I have used at least ten times both wet and dry and as hard as I worked at it, no matter how many times I went back over the same areas I never got close to smooth or silky. I did have a razor rash feeling after each use. Wish I had something good to say about it. First experience with electric razor has been very disappointing, Definitely returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so far but it gave a close shave following the directions
customer_reviews.author: JClay

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to shave wet or dry. Gets a decent shave. Not as close as a razor, but good for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could return
customer_reviews.text: Do not like this razor. It is too large for a woman for one thing and it does not cut worth beans. The plastic cover comes off hard and it took apart the whole blade section.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Retiree

customer_reviews.title: Just not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: I have to say it's not the Lady Remington my mother had 20 years ago. Still getting used to it but it does tell me to give it time in the paperwork! Easy to hold, easy to clean, not awkward and the battery seems to last a long time between charges!
customer_reviews.author: Denice Kimble

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my mom and she has psoriasis, works great!!
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY S

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice razor but for having 3 blades it sure doesn’t work that well. You have to go over your leg a couple of times to shave it smooth. Up and down motion to have it do a better job. It’s pretty loud too. I’ll just stick to a disposable .
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: After years of suffering from nicks, cuts, and shaving bumps, I gave in and decided to try an electric razor. I choose this electric razor based on all the positive reviews. Other reviewers commented that this razor shaves closer than a blade and the results last longer. "Fake" reviews? This razor is not superior to a blade. It does not shave as close, and I still get bumps after shaving. Guess it's back to the old fashion way for me!
customer_reviews.author: G. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: this is a quick and easy fix that leaves my legs feeling smooth
customer_reviews.text: For the days that I just don't have time to shave my legs, this is a quick and easy fix that leaves my legs feeling smooth. It holds a charge for a long time and also charges very quickly. There is no way to know when it is done charging, I just recommend giving it an hour or two, and it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Elko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is like the best thing I have bought in my adult life . I don't need to shave that often to begin with . But when i do i just use this and I'm done in less than 5 mins . Works great .
customer_reviews.author: Erin Poulo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Big fan! If the hair is too long it does pull a bit, but if you trim you will have a nice, close shave with this. Very happy as I had to take a financial break from my bi monthly Brazilian waxes.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie4Shizzie

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: bought our second Remington wet dry shaver . Both quite working within a year. Bought these because of the name. Looking for a new one now and see many units that are cheaper and not Remington. Will buy one of those. Do not recommend buying this. Battery issues.
customer_reviews.author: marty

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shaver Indeed
customer_reviews.text: The Remington WDF5030 provides a smooth shave and a closer shave than most other ladies electric shavers. There is no pinching, it stays charged longer and it feels comfortable in your hand. Definitely a ★★★★★ product!
customer_reviews.author: MomfromTN

customer_reviews.title: Best electric razor I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Close shave, doesn't pull or scratch, and battery lasted more than long enough to do both legs. I haven't tried it in the shower yet so I can't comment on that, but it works perfectly while dry! I was so impressed with it that I ordered one for my mom as well. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh ... it's ok
customer_reviews.text: Eh ... not a close enough shave. I find myself going over and over and over the same parts in order to fully remove all hair. I don't think there's a perfect electric razor out there so I think I'll quit looking.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Litterio

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: Really not impressed.... I had an older version that worked way better, but the old one would cause too much irritation on sensitive areas.... this one does not leave a lot of irritation though. It just misses a lot of hair
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice razor. blades move really fast so no pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: She wants a barber
customer_reviews.text: Her other Remington chargeable wouldn't hold much of a charge any longer so I got this one. Immediately upon reading the instructions she did not like the cleaning steps this one required...
customer_reviews.author: photojock

customer_reviews.title: Well made product for a quick shave
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for a quick shave, but don't expect to ever get as close a shave as with a razor blade. It will never happen! Just remember that this is for a quick shave before heading out the door. The product is well made and seems like it will last a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Malberg

customer_reviews.title: Battery didn't last
customer_reviews.text: This shaver could have lasted a lot longer, except for the battery. It's now to the point where I'm going to have to toss the shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: Makes Life Easier
customer_reviews.text: I cannot shave in the shower anymore due to back issues blah blah blah, this makes it easier for me to get the job done and in a timely manner. Just have to remember to have the puppy charged up! Remember to exfoliate your legs though, it is something you're missing by not actually shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Tugs and doesn't cut well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this looking for a better grooming product and this disappointing immensely. I'm upset at wasting my money but not much I can do at this point other than protect others. The trimmer just tugs and pulls and doesn't cut cleanly at ALL. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Philipp

customer_reviews.title: Stubble it
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping the negative reviews I read were wrong, but they were not. This product is very ineffective. Even though I I am a blonde with very little hair on my legs, it left nothing but stubble. I had to go over my legs with a regular razor afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when cleaning. The parts are a little delicate. Good product for the good price though. My last one lasted years so I’m hoping the same from this one. Does better on dry skin than wet.
customer_reviews.author: Shann

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shaver! Cuts closer than my Panasonic and in one pass almost every time. Spent less than 5 minutes using this shaver. With the Panasonic, I almost ran the charge down while shaving. Will stick with this shaver!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B Stovall

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Love this new shaver. My old one would not keep a charge anymore more. Had it for years. Same brand and shaver. Works great in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Darovitz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love Remington razors! This one is as good as my last. Leaves legs perfectly smooth.. the base makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked ok for about a month and then it no longer worked.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in March and it worked until April. It totally broke down. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great product...
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes this Remington. Does a great job and we really shopped and looked at different ones. She really likes it and it is her second. One thing, we found you might be money ahead just using it and wear it out instead of trying to change the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this little razor. My old one died after 10 years so was happy with the updated style of this
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: Surprised it works so well. Not super smooth but definitely worth the convenience and ease of use. I took it on vacation and I was ready so quickly- didn’t miss out on anything having to jump in the shower every day to shave
customer_reviews.author: christine skiles

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that Amazon had this on the Prime sale. The Remington shaver is much nicer than an razor.
customer_reviews.author: xani

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to spend a little more for my razor and I'm not disappointed. Had another brand previously and just felt like I couldn't get a close shave even after replacing the heads. This one does a really nice job and I like the way it fits in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: L. Komidar

customer_reviews.title: It is nice that it can be used in the shower
customer_reviews.text: It is o.k. it does work well but the closeness you want comes only get from a regular disposable-blade shaver. Just my opinion. Not too difficult to take apart but the foils have to be replaced. I do not know how long they last since I have not used my shaver that much. It is nice that it can be used in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Must use multiple times over legs to get all the hair of.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and leaves my skin very soft feeling but it took a lot of repetitions over my legs to get the hair all off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I'm shocked that an electric shaver works as well as this on does. Shaves right down to the skin. Amazing. Easy to hold onto also.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Geary

customer_reviews.title: Great zhaver
customer_reviews.text: I had a Remington shaver for many years until it went bad. Got this for one and it is better then the one I had improved
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great reliable razor
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Remington Smooth and Silky. I keep one on my dressing table for quick fixes and one in my shower. I love this model. Shaves close but no drag or pull.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to Blade
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an alternative to a safety razor. Did not cut close enough.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Did not last. Failed to charge after several uses. One more thing going to the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Ann H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this razor. It works on dry or wet skin. Gets the hair the first time over the area. Very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: mary b. delancey

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved this gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift...wife loves this product. Easy to use and versatile. Good quality and small enough to store without hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! My old Lady Remington I have had for 28 years. This new and improved one works wonderfully. We bought one for my granddaughter and she really liked it. So I thought well I will get one for me. I must say that it works so well that I may never use my double edge razor again. I have really dry skin so I usually don't shave has often in the winter but my new Remington has changed that. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like is that it doesn't shave close enough. This is my first electric razor, so maybe that is how they are supposed to be. It helps in a pinch when I am in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: This works very well. Stays charged for a long ...
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. Stays charged for a long long time. I use it dry (not wet). Just wish I could find the replacement screen/blade for it. Amazon does not carry it and I have checked in several stores to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: best shaver ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver!! Good electric shavers are hard to find- look no further!! So happy with this shaver!!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Falgout

product_meta.title: Remington WDF5030ACDN Smooth & Silky Electric Shaver for Women, White/Purple
product_meta.description:
Color:White/Purple

Smooth Shave Technology delivers comfort, closeness, and convenience, in the Remington Smooth & Silky Women’s Rechargeable Shaver. The angled shaver head features four blades that stay close to the skin for swift, smooth results. The unique foils and special dual-sided trimmer guide hairs towards the blades to make every pass count. And you’ll love the convenience of the cordless, rechargeable shaver that can be used in the shower and with shaving gel. Plus, the moisturizing almond oil strip transfers nourishment to the skin during shaving for the ultimate comfort.

Smooth Glide Technology. Hypoallergenic 4-Blade Shaver. Optimal Angle Head. Flex Dual-Sided Trimmer. Lift Logic Foils. Almond Oil Strip. Anti-Microbial. Soft Touch Sides for No-Slip Grip. Recharge Time 20 Hours. Also Included: Charge stand, bikini comb, head guard, and beauty bag for storage and travel. 100% Waterproof - For best product performance, do not completely submerge in water.
feature_bullets: Smooth Glide Technology The new open blade cutting system allows for hair and shaving gels to easily pass through the foils and reach the blades, resulting in a smooth, silky shave
4 Blade Shaver The hypoallergenic foils and trimmers move smoothly across the skin and leave no hair behind; Moisturizer Strip Technology Almond Oil
Optimal Angle Head Shaving blades are positioned so that foils stay flush to the skin for a close, comfortable shave
Flex Dual Sided Trimmer Get speed and smoothness from this special blade that preps longer hairs to be cut by the foils
Lift Logic Foils The unique foil design allows for even shaving of all hair lengths by angling hairs towards the blades

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
